name: What box?
description:
Controls: Gamepad Joystick (recommended) or WASD/arrows/D-pad.

You control a person in a cardboard box trying to get to the end of the building, being guided by an accomplice in the security room. The movement is done from the point of view of the security camera.

Disclaimer: this is a week-long jam game made by two people, so judge it as such :)

By Oriol Prat (@uriprat), zehnjucht.com
and Sergi Lázaro (@sergilazaro), sergilazaro.com
